alert.note: Alert for Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 12:44PM CDT until May 07 at 8:02AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Kansas, including the following county, Neosho. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Some roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1242 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Parsons, Erie, St. Paul, Thayer, Galesburg, Lake Parsons and South Mound. -
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
